front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Health Informatics - Personal Health Device Communication - Interface Profile - Cabled Ethernet
front.abstract: This document focuses on the application of the Ethernet family (IEEE 802.3â„¢) of protocols for use in medial device communication. The scope is limited to referencing the appropriate Ethrnet family specifications and calling out any specific special needs or requirements of the ISOL/IEEE 11073(tm) environment, with a particular focus on easing interoperabiity and controlling costs.
